page.title: 03RELIGIONS IN DARLINGTON
page.content: Within our area of twelve square kilometres there are quite a variety of religious faiths.There are twelve different ones, the most common ones are Church of England,Roman Catholic and Methodist.There are also quite a number of less common ones, Jews, Quakers and United Reform. Darlington is known as a Quaker town. Our part of town is served by eight churches and a synagogue.Three Church of England, three Roman Catholic and two Methodist.There is also a Jewish synagogue.It is on Bloomfield Road. Members of the less common religions may have to travel up to thirty miles to go to church every Sunday The Jewish religion may be a less common religion but the Jews need not travel out of Darlington to go to a synagogue every Saturday.
